remarks: Weak version of ~ hbal .  Uses only Tarski's FOL axiom schemes.  Unlike ~ hbal , this theorem requires that ` x ` and ` y ` be distinct i.e. are not bundled.  (Contributed by NM, 19-Apr-2017.)
statement:
hbalw.1 $e |- ( x = z -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
hbalw.2 $e |- ( ph -> A. x ph ) $.
hbalw $p |- ( A. y ph -> A. x A. y ph ) $.
$d ph z $.
$d ps x $.
$d x y $.
$d x z $.
